text:
.1 Ketentuan plafond pembiayaan commercial saat ini tidak sesuai dengan kenaikan harga kendaraan commercial yang tinggi
.2 Adanya potensi market yang besar di segmen kendaraan truck kategori 3 retail yang belum
tergarap maksimal
.3 Hilangnya nasabah AO/RO yang eligible karena keterbatasan plafon pokok hutang cabang
untuk product commercial retail
4.
Mempertimbangkan perkembangan potensi pasar saat ini, kompetior memberikan plafon pokok hutang untuk product commercial diangka yang lebih tinggi yaitu ≤5 Milyar
Maksud & Tujuan:
1.
Mengacu pada ketentuan KS-001A/BAS/NFB/III/2023 "Ketentuan Umum dan Penanganan Aplikasi Pembiayaan Commercial dan Fleet untuk menaikan plafon pokok hutang untuk product commercial yang sebelumnya ≤3 Milyar menjadi ≤ 5 Milyar
.2
Mendukung penawaran product commercial dengan plafon kredit yang lebih tinggi agar dapat bersaing dengan competitor
3.
Mengelola nasabah AO/RO yang eligible dengan mempertimbangkan plafon pokok hutang yang sesuai dengan pasar
trans:
1. The terms for the current commercial financing ceiling are not in line with the high increase in commercial vehicle prices
2. There is a big market potential in the third retail category of the truck vehicle segment that has not been
optimally developed
3. The loss of eligible AO/RO customers because of the branch's limited principal debt ceilings
for retail commercial products
4.
Considering the current market potential development, competitors give principal ceilings for commercial products at a higher number of ≤ 5 Billions
Purpose and Objectives:
1.
Referring to the Terms of KS-001A/BAS/NFB/III/2023 "The General Terms and Commercial Financing Application Handling and Fleet for increasing the principal ceilings for commercial products from previously ≤3 Billions to ≤ 5 Billions
2.
Supporting commercial product offer with a higher credit ceiling in order to be able to compete with the competitors
3.
Managing eligible AO/RO customers by considering the principal ceilings which are in line with the market
